title: Create and Amend a Foreign Property Annual Summary
description: This endpoint allows a developer to re-submit adjustments and allowances for a foreign property business. This submission is for either or both of Furnished Holiday Letting (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) and Non FHL Foreign Property submissions. A National Insurance number, business ID and tax year must be provided.

foreignFhlEea.description: Object holding the adjustments and allowances of the user's Furnished Holiday Lets in the European Economic Area for the period.

adjustments.description: Object holding Foreign FHL EEA Property Adjustments.

privateUseAdjustment.description:
Any adjustments that are not solely for the property business.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

balancingCharge.description:
If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

periodOfGraceAdjustment.description:
A boolean to identify a property which didn't qualify for FHL this year, but qualified the previous year.

The value must be true or false.

allowances.description: Object holding other and property allowances details.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description:
The amount claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherCapitalAllowance.description:
All other capital allowances.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

electricChargePointAllowance.description:
The expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionsCarAllowance.description:
The amount of zero emissions car allowance.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyIncomeAllowance.description:
The limited amount Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property.

The value must be between 0 and 1000.00 to 2 decimal places.

foreignNonFhlProperty.description: Array holding the adjustments and allowances of the user's foreign property business - excluding Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) - for the period.

countryCode.description:
A three-letter code that represents a country name.

This must be an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 value.

adjustments.description: Object holding foreign Non FHL Property annual adjustments.

privateUseAdjustment.description:
Any adjustments that are not solely for the property business.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

balancingCharge.description:
If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowances.description: Object holding foreign Non FHL Property Allowances.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description:
The amount claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfReplacingDomesticItems.description:
Cost of Replacing Domestic Items - formerly Wear and Tear allowance.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description:
The amount of Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherCapitalAllowance.description:
All other capital allowances.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

electricChargePointAllowance.description:
The expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionsCarAllowance.description:
The amount of zero emissions car allowance.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyIncomeAllowance.description:
The limited amount Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property.



The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

amount.description:
The amount of structured building allowance.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

firstYear.description: Object holding foreign Non FHL structured building allowance details.

qualifyingDate.description:
The date qualified for structured building allowance.

Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD.

qualifyingAmountExpenditure.description:
The amount of qualifying expenditure.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

building.description:
Object holding foreign Non FHL structured building details.
Post code is mandatory and minimum one of name and number field must be supplied.
